## Ingredients

* Reproducible science

## Methods for reproducible data analysis

* R and Rstudio
* git and GitHub
* Coding style
* Importing data
* `tidyverse` for data management
* `ggplot2` for plots
* Strings with regular expressions
* Dates with `lubridate`
* Debugging code
* Rmarkdown for reproducible manuscripts
* Dependency management

## Quantitiative methods for palaeoecology

* Age-depth modelling
* Ordinations
* (Constrained) cluster analysis
* Transfer functions and diagnostics
* Diversity, rates of change
* Trend detection
